alert.note: Alert for Bowman (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 4:31AM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF WESTERN BOWMAN COUNTY THROUGH 400 AM MDT... At 330 AM MDT, a strong thunderstorm was located 8 miles west of Mud Buttes, or 26 miles southeast of Baker, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Mud Buttes around 340 AM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Rhame. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM MDT for southwestern North Dakota.
